original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 12.6. Hetuduka, Piṭṭhiduka
analyzed: hetuduka piṭṭhiduka

original: Nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum nana dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ
analyzed: na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na na bhāvanāya pahātabba

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetu

original: nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: nana dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nasavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: na hetum na sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na avitakkam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: nahetuṁ nasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: na hetum na sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na avicāram dhammam paṭicca pe

original: nahetuṁ nasappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
analyzed: na hetum na sappītikam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na appītikam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: nahetuṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nanapītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetum na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nahetuṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nanasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: pe na hetum na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na na sukha sahagatam dhamma

original: paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ
analyzed: paṭicca pe na hetum na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na na aupekkhā sahagata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe

original: Nahetuṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nanakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetum na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nahetuṁ narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nanarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: pe na hetum na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nahetuṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nanaarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: pe na hetum na arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na na arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca pe

original: Nahetuṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetum na pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na a pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nahetuṁ naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: pe na hetum na niyyānikam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na aniyyānikam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nahetuṁ naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: pe na hetum na niyatam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: Nahetuṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: na hetum na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca pe

original: Nahetuṁ nasauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. Nahetuṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: na hetum na sauttaram dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca pe

original: Nahetuṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na hetum na saraṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na saraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha nava

original: Nahetuṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ
analyzed: na hetum na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetu

original: naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naaraṇaṁ
analyzed: na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na araṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naaraṇo ca nanahetu naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na hetu na araṇaḥ ca na na hetu na araṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nanahetuṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: nana hetum na araṇam dhammam paṭicca nana hetu na araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nanahetuṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ
analyzed: na na hetum na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na hetu

original: naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naaraṇo ca nanahetu naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na araṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na araṇaḥ ca na na hetu na araṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ naaraṇañca nanahetuṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na hetum na araṇam ca na na hetum na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naaraṇañca nanahetuṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naaraṇo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na hetum na araṇam ca na na hetum na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na araṇaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ naaraṇañca nanahetuṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum na araṇam ca na na hetum na araṇam ca dhammam paṭicca

original: nahetu naaraṇo ca nanahetu naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu na araṇo ca na na hetu na araṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava sabbattha nava
